Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-39348 affecting package python-twisted for versions less than 22.10.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-39348 affecting package python-twisted for versions less than 22.10.0-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-twisted is earlier than 22.10.0-2, affected by CVE-2022-39348
